subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Just wondering,
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1242265127
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Well, I am in my office, with a tv in both the front room, and in my  
bedroom, so they can watch tv if they get bored. <g>  They probably  go 
downstairs because all your stuff is down there, why not ask them if they  would 
rather be upstairs, maybe the kitchen. hehe
 
 
In a message dated 5/13/2009 9:15:28 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
purplealiengirl@... writes:

 
 


It's just an assumtption on most "ghost hunters" part that the dead  would 
be where they died, or were burried, a Hollywoodism I think. I  record in my 
basement. 
 
 F-S


On Wed, May 13, 2009 at 7:07 PM, <_SnowfireL@..._ 
(mailto:SnowfireL@...) >  wrote:


 
 


I have a question, why is it that people are always going to grave  yards, 
why would any spirit or ghost want to hang around in a place of so  much 
sadness, when they've got the whole universe to explore.  Why  don't they go to 
some fun places?
 
 
In a message dated 5/13/2009 8:05:16 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, 
_EVP-ITC@yahoogroupsEVP-_ (mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com)  writes:
